text: Hans-Jürgen Becher (born 21 September 1941) is a retired German footballer who played as a defender. He completed 32 matches in the Oberliga West and made 201 appearances in the Bundesliga for Schalke 04. == References == == External links == * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:German footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Bundesliga players Category:FC Schalke 04 players Category:Sportspeople from Gelsenkirchen
title: Hans-Jürgen Becher
